00011 // uv.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 // UVTexture Declarations
00016 class UVTexture : public Texture<Spectrum> {
00017 public:
00018         // UVTexture Public Methods
00019         UVTexture(TextureMapping2D *m) {
00020                 mapping = m;
00021         }
00022         ~UVTexture() {
00023                 delete mapping;
00024         }
00025         Spectrum Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00026                 float s, t, dsdx, dtdx, dsdy, dtdy;
00027                 mapping->Map(dg, &s, &t, &dsdx, &dtdx, &dsdy, &dtdy);
00028                 float cs[COLOR_SAMPLES];
00029                 memset(cs, 0, COLOR_SAMPLES * sizeof(float));
00030                 cs[0] = s - Floor2Int(s);
00031                 cs[1] = t - Floor2Int(t);
00032                 return Spectrum(cs);
00033         }
00034 private:
00035         TextureMapping2D *mapping;
00036 };
00037 // UVTexture Method Definitions
00038 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00039                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00040         return NULL;
00041 }
00042 
00043 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00044                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00045         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00046         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00047         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00048         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00049                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00050                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00051                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00052                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00053                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00054         }
00055         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00056         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00057         else if (type == "planar")
00058                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00059                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00060                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00061         else {
00062                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00063                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00064         }
00065         return new UVTexture(map);
00066 }
